security: Disclosing the specific code names and systems (GRAFEND, TRAIN, LENROUP-1, ISSUE SYSTEM, FP066707, IX 97957) could reveal sensitive operational methods and technological capabilities. Revealing the request to “train LENROUP-1 SW Match” could expose technological or operational assets. Quoting directly: “Request permission train/ LENROUP-1 SW Match”.
summary: A classified message requesting permission to train and use the LENROUP-1 system, with coordination details and approval notes.
summary_one_paragraph: This classified message, dated with illegible characters but filed under the JFK Assassination Records Act, requests authorization to train personnel on and utilize the LENROUP-1 system. The request, involving GRAFEND TRAIN, includes reference to system match #23209 and developer #22669. The message indicates coordination with R. Chin (FE/JKO) and Mr. John Kemedy (FR/TRLB), and approval is implied. The memo is routed through DESPOCEN RI/AN and FE, signed by Seymour Fussell (Chief, TSD) and Charles J. Ryan (/AC/ISD/DA, Chief).
title: Request for Training and Usage of LENROUP-1 System
sender: Seymour Fussell (CHIEF, TSD), Charles J. Ryan (/AC/ISD/DA CHIEF)
